original: Capgemini SE  is a  French multinational  expert administration and business counseling enterprise  headquartered in Paris, France . It gives IT benefits and is one of the world's biggest IT counseling, outsourcing and proficient administrations organizations with more than 200, 000 representatives in more than 40 nations, of whom about 100, 000 are in India. It was established in 1967 by Serge Kampf in Grenoble, France. Paul Hermelin has been director and CEO of the Capgemini since his arrangement in December 2001.
result: Capgemini SE is a globally recognised professional services and business consultancy firm that operates from its headquarters in Paris, France. The company is known for providing top-notch IT solutions and is considered as one of the largest IT consultancy, outsourcing and professional services companies in the world. Currently, Capgemini boasts of a workforce of more than 200,000 employees spread across over 40 countries, with India having about 100,000 of its employees. Established in 1967 by Serge Kampf in Grenoble, France, Capgemini is presently headed by Paul Hermelin, who has been serving as the CEO since December 2001.

original: Capgemini was put at #665 in Forbes' rundown of The World's Largest Public Companies, at #233 Top Multinational Performers and at #391 in World's Best Employers.
result: Capgemini has been recognised in Forbes' rankings, with a global ranking of #665 among The World's Largest Public Companies, a #233 ranking among Top Multinational Performers, and a #391 ranking among World's Best Employers.

original: Capgemini conducts 3-4 rounds to select fresher as Software Developer in their organization.
result: To become a Software Developer at Capgemini as a fresher, applicants must go through a series of 3-4 rounds of selection processes.

original: 65 percent or above in B.Tech, Class X and XII.
result: A minimum of 65% marks is required in B.Tech, as well as in Class X and XII to be eligible for the program.

original: No backlogs at the time of interview
result: The candidate must not have any pending or unfinished academic requirements or coursework during the time of the interview.

original: The Written round consists of three major sections namely number series, General Aptitude Test, and English Assessment Test. For Number Series and General Aptitude Test, there is a time of 2 hours 15 min and for the English Assessment Test, the total time duration is 20 minutes. There is no timer for each question as in the 1st round. Both are objective tests.
result: The second round of the selection process includes three main parts: Number Series, General Aptitude Test, and English Assessment Test. The duration for Number Series and General Aptitude Test is two hours and 15 minutes, while the English Assessment Test is allotted a total of 20 minutes. Unlike the first round, there is no set timer for each question in this round, and both tests are multiple-choice.

original: The students who clear the written round are called for Technical Interview. There is a fixed rule for which questions will be asked in this round, you can expect questions on any topic depending on the panel. To clear this round you should be clear with your basics. You should be prepared with Data structures and Algorithms, DBMS, Operating System, Networking, OOPs concepts and a programming language of your choice. They also ask questions from the resume.
result: After passing the written round, candidates are invited to the Technical Interview round. The questions asked in this round can vary depending on the interviewer, covering a range of topics including Data structures and Algorithms, DBMS, Operating System, Networking, OOPs concepts and programming languages. It's imperative to have a good grasp of the fundamentals to succeed in this round. Additionally, interviewers may ask questions related to the candidate's resume.

original: Try to be as interactive with interviewers as possible.
result: Being engaging and actively involved during an interview can make a positive impression on your interviewers.

Content: "Plagiarism is the act of using someone else's words or ideas without giving proper credit. It is considered a serious offense in academic and professional settings, as it undermines the original work and undermines the credibility of the person committing the act. There are various tools and techniques available to detect plagiarism, including online plagiarism checkers and software programs that compare text to a database of known plagiarism sources. To avoid plagiarism, it is important to properly cite and reference any sources used in your work and to always double-check to ensure that all sources are properly attributed." 

Rewritten: "Using someone's else's words or ideas without giving them credit is known as plagiarism, which is regarded as a severe violation of academic, and professional ethics, since it compromises the original work and the reputation of the plagiarizer. There are multiple options for detecting plagiarism, such as online checkers and software that correlate the text with a database of known sources. To prevent plagiarism, one must appropriately acknowledge and reference all sources cited and verify the accuracy of such citations."

original: My name is Ginni Bhatia. I am from Kurukshetra. I have done Master of Computer Application from ABC College which is affiliated to Kurukshetra University. I did my academic project on updated technology like machine learning and data mining. I am good in Java and C programming language. As my family background is considered, we are 3 in number. My father is an electronic shopkeeper and my mother is a homemaker. My strength is my self-learning abilities & positive mind. My weakness is, I don't take rest until my work is finished. My short term goal is to be a part of your company and my long term goal is to be successful in every parameter of this company.
result: My name is Ginni Bhatia, and I hail from Kurukshetra. I hold a Master of Computer Application degree from ABC College, which is affiliated with Kurukshetra University. During my academic tenure, I completed a project that delved into new-age technology such as machine learning and data mining. I have a strong command over Java and C programming languages. As for my family background, I come from a family of three, with my father being an electronic shopkeeper and my mother being a homemaker. My strengths lie in my ability to self-teach and maintain a positive outlook. However, my only weakness is my drive to keep working until I reach my goal. In the short run, I want to join your esteemed company, and in the long run, I aspire to attain success in every aspect of my work.

original: As fresher, I don't have any experience. If you hire me, it is a great opportunity to me to learn something new and achieve my goals. This is only possible if you hired me and I assure you that I will give my best and this best is beneficial for our company.
result: As a newcomer to the industry, I do not have previous professional experience. However, if given the chance to work with your company, it would be a privilege for me to learn and grow in my career. I am highly motivated to achieve my goals and believe that being a part of your team would allow me to do just that. Rest assured that with me on board, I will dedicate myself to delivering excellent work and contributing to the success of the company.

original: It is a great honor for me to work in a reputed company likes yours because it is a great multinational company. It has many branches across the world. Employee satisfaction is good in your company. It's a good platform for me to showcase my talent and enhance my skill and knowledge.
result: Working in a renowned multinational corporation like yours would be a great privilege for me. Your company has a global presence with numerous branches worldwide, and the satisfaction of your employees is commendable. Joining your team would provide me with an excellent opportunity to showcase my abilities, enrich my knowledge and skills, and grow as a professional.

original: I can adjust rapidly to new conditions. Since I am clear about my activity part and I am mentally prepared to take up challenges, I believe I have the ability to catch on quickly and apply my new knowledge.
result: I possess the skill of adapting quickly to changing circumstances. I have a clear understanding of my job responsibilities and am always mentally prepared to take on new challenges, which allows me to learn quickly and effectively apply my new knowledge.

original: I have a good knowledge of SQL Server, MySQL, LINUX, Microsoft Word, Excel etc.
result: I am proficient in various computer programs and applications such as SQL Server, MySQL, LINUX, and Microsoft Word and Excel.

original: I can expect something which I can meet my expenses.
result: I anticipate receiving compensation that will cover my financial obligations.

original: My father is my inspiration because he always shows me the path from nothing to everything. He always guides me to achieve success in every matter of my life. He is also my best friend because he always suggested me as a friend when I make a wrong filthy mistake.
result: The person who inspires me the most is my father. He has always been there to guide and support me in every aspect of my life. His determination and hard work have shown me the way to achieve success from nothing. He has not only been a parent, but also a friend who I can rely on. Whenever I make a mistake, he gives me valuable advice and helps me to make things right.

original: Sir, you are more educated, more talented, more experienced than me I am not on a level to judge you.
result: I have immense respect for your education, talent, and experience. Consequently, I don't feel qualified to pass judgment on you.

original: My short-term goal is to be a part of your organization and my long-term goal is to be successful in every parameter of this company.
result: My immediate objective is to become a valued member of your company. In the long run, I plan to excel in all aspects of the organization and achieve significant success.

original: I get angry when the work given to me is not done on time.
result: When assigned work is not completed within the designated timeframe, it tends to trigger feelings of frustration and anger within me.
